member.name: ID3D11Multithread.GetMultithreadProtected
member.summary: Find out if multithread protection is turned on or not.
member.returns: Returns true if multithread protection is turned on, false otherwise.

member.name: ID3D11Multithread.SetMultithreadProtected
member.summary: Turns multithread protection on or off.
member.param: Set to true to turn multithread protection on, false to turn it off.
member.returns: True if multithread protection was already turned on prior to calling this method, false otherwise.

member.name: ID3D11Multithread
member.summary: Provides threading protection for critical sections of a multi-threaded application.
